Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 6th overall pick, by Plum Grove in 1972...
Was selected to the 1983 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Manchester on 9/3/1984...
Had 2000th career hit on 9/18/1984, off Harold Miller (CBC)...
Hit for the cycle against Northeastern on 4/29/1985...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Northeastern on 4/29/1985...
Won World Championship with Boston (FBA) in 1985...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/1986, hitting .433 with 2 HR, 23 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/1/1986, hitting .500 with 1 HR, 7 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/14/1987, hitting .519 with 4 HR, 14 RBI...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/8/1987, hitting .542 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
